code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{Container,Card}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("/api/products/".concat(id)).then(response=>setProduct(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[id]);if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"my-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:product.image,style:{height:'400px',objectFit:'cover'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{children:["Price: $",product.price]})]})]})});};export default ProductDetail;
